summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2856 for the improvement of Tenth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein a sewer of proper materials and dimensions, together with all wyes, openings, flush tanks, manholes, catch basins and all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 34643, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
